title: На реке
overview: Svetlana is a famous rehabilitation doctor. One day she witnesses the death of her close friend Denis, partially loses her memory and decides to flee the city in order to think over everything and understand what to do next. Meanwhile, an influential businessman, the father of the murdered man, Alexander Garin, is hot on her heels, and he manages to track down and kidnap Sveta. But fortunately, she has a person who is ready to save her.
